display_long_description:
I’m Bouncer brings the thrill of casino security into an action-packed VR experience. Guard the glamorous casino entrance, inspect every guest, and decide who gets to play at the tables. Can you stop cheaters and troublemakers before they hit the floor? 🕶️
Features:
🛡️ Immersive VR Casino Bouncer Gameplay: Take control at the casino doors and keep the gaming floor safe in a rich VR environment.
🔍 High-Stakes Inspections: Scan guests with metal detectors, uncover hidden contraband, and spot fake IDs and shady players.
💈 Groom & Clean Visitors: Remove tattoos, trim beards, give sharp haircuts, or freshen up guests before they step onto the casino floor.
🛠️ Tools & Upgrades: Unlock advanced gadgets and buy powerful tools to deal with VIP guests, cheaters, and increasingly complex scenarios.
🎉 Fun & Chaos: Interact with eccentric gamblers, use quirky props, and handle surprising situations with style.
🌟 Climb the Ranks: Work your way up from small-time casino doors to the most luxurious venues and become the ultimate high-stakes enforcer.
Whether you’re chasing cheaters or handling eccentric guests, I’m Bouncer delivers a fast-paced, immersive VR casino adventure where your attention to detail wins big.
